text: Would you be interested in donating to Save the Children ?
I am one who like to donate. Can you tell me more about it?
Save the Children helps to promote childrens rights to health, education, and safety.
Do they have any focus right now?  More as where are the majority of the fund headed towards right now/
At this point a lot of the focus is children in war zones. some of these donations can address the problem of the daily threat of violence
It seems like Syria seems to be a high stakes area. Are any fund going to help the the children in Hawaii after the volcano and hurricane?
I'm not sure, but I think that would be a great idea. Maybe you could get more information on that by getting in contact with someone at  URL
What are some of the things that they do for the children? I would like to donate but I am not a huge fan or donating just for promotion?

They help to provide basic health care, provide disaster relief, and help to ensure their rights to education and safety. How much would you like to donate ? Your donation will be deducted from your task payment.
I am interested in donating most of my task payment. How would I go about this?
I do believe you have to go to  URL
Would 60% of the task payment be enough? I know its not much.
Yes, that sounds good. How much would that be ?
I think it would be roughly $1.20. Is there a follow up on to see how my money while little is may be is being put to use?
I do believe you can get that information from their website. Thank you so much for taking the time to speak with me and also for your donation. Take care and have a great day.
This charity seems to have children's best interests at heart. I am very happy to help
Yes it does. Now, how do we submit this hit ?
We still have chat a bit more. Have you heard any break thought about this charity? I am really interested.

You were asking about the hurricane relief in Hawaii. From what I understand, they are on stand-by and ready to provide help if needed. I think that is awesome. I had no idea they operated in the USA also. I always thought these organizations focused on other countries
That is very awesome. I am proud to be apart of helping them help others
I also found out that 86% of donations goes to services and only 5% goes to management. I was glad to hear that. It was nice chatting with you. I enjoyed this. You take care and have a good day.
